sentences.english: This list looks at 10 modern examples of hostage taking.
sentences.chinese: 這份目錄選出10大現代人質挾持編列成表。

sentences.english: Eric pursuit to the temple, enlightenment and perched on a day.
sentences.chinese: 阿力追擊到寺廟，並挾持天悟。

sentences.english: It forked money over only when faced with the prospect of violence.
sentences.chinese: 它也是在被暴力挾持的情況下才無奈選擇付錢。

sentences.english: In his dream, he was shanghaied by aliens.
sentences.chinese: 他夢見自己被外星人挾持了。

sentences.english: The German consul William Liu Yunxiang hostage, to let the money for Henry han.

sentences.english: The police rescued the woman from the hijackers' clutches.
sentences.chinese: 警方從劫機犯手中救出遭挾持的一名女性。

sentences.english: Chuck Norris doesn't breathe; he holds air hostage.
sentences.chinese: 羅禮士不呼吸，他是挾持空氣當人質。

sentences.english: "I have been arrested by a resistance group in Iraq, " Hallums said.
sentences.chinese: “我被伊拉克的頑固分子挾持，”哈盧姆斯說。

sentences.english: I worry about the power Apple could have with this force behind them.
sentences.chinese: 我擔心蘋果會挾持他們身後的這股力量。

sentences.english: Police are said to be negotiating with the man.
sentences.chinese: 據稱，警方正在與挾持者展開談判。

sentences.english: Colombian authorities say the kidnapped governor of southern Caqueta province has been found dead.
sentences.chinese: 哥倫比亞官員稱，被挾持的南方卡克塔省省長已死亡。

sentences.english: Mendoza used a hostage as a human shield to protect himself, before being killed.
sentences.chinese: 門多薩在臨死前還挾持了一名人質來做他的盾牌。
